attributes.action: Introduce basic qualifications for entry to our country. They should iclude, a job and the ability to speak english
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We spend millions on the translation of documents so that imigrants are able to understand how to claim benefits. Whilst we understand that Britain is considered to be a haven for many unfortunates we must not encourage  'free loaders'. We believe that imigration is out of control and that a basic qualification for entry should be an existing job to go to and the ability to speak English.
